actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on metal halide lamps designed for use in video projectors.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to: (1) modify the article description of metal halide lamps designed for use in video projectors, and (2) extend temporarily the suspension of duty on such articles.

titles.title: A bill to extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on metal halide lamps designed for use in video projectors.
